li%3E%3C%2Ful%3E%3Cp%3EThe+advantage+of+JSONB+in+SQLite+is+that+it+is+smaller+and+faster+than+text+JSON+%E2%80%94+potentially+several+times+faster.+There+is+space+in+the+on-disk+JSONB+format+to+add+enhancements+and+future+versions+of+SQLite+might+include+options+to+provide+O%281%29+lookup+of+elements+in+JSONB%2C+but+no+such+capability+is+currently+available.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Ch2+id%3D%22jsonb-functions%22%3EJSONB+functions%3C%2Fh2%3E%3Cp%3EMost+SQL+functions+that+return+JSON+text+have+a+corresponding+function+that+returns+the+equivalent+JSONB.+The+functions+that+return+JSON+in+the+text+format+begin+with+%3Ccode%3Ejson_%3C%2Fcode%3E+and+functions+that+return+the+binary+JSONB+format+begin+with+%3Ccode%3Ejsonb_%3C%2Fcode%3E.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cp%3EThe+%3Ccode%3Ejsonb%3C%2Fcode%3E%2C+%3Ccode%3Ejsonb_array%3C%2Fcode%3E+and+%3Ccode%3Ejsonb_object%3C%2Fcode%3E+return+the+binary+JSONB+representation%3A%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cdiv+class%3D%22highlight%22%3E%3Cpre+tabindex%3D%220%22+style%3D%22background-color%3A%23fff%3B-moz-tab-size%3A4%3B-o-tab-size%3A4%3Btab-size%3A4%22%3E%3Ccode+class%3D%22language-sql%22+data-lang%3D%22sql%22%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eselect%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Etypeof%3C%2Fspan%3E%28%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Ejsonb%3C%2Fspan%3E%28%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23c41a16%22%3E%26%2339%3B%7B%26%2334%3Bname%26%2334%3B%3A%26%2334%3Balice%26%2334%3B%7D%26%2339%3B%3C%2Fspan%3E%29%29%3B%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eselect%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Ejsonb%3C%2Fspan%3E%28%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23c41a16%22%3E%26%2339%3B%7B%26%2334%3Bname%26%2334%3B%3A%26%2334%3Balice%26%2334%3B%7D%26%2339%3B%3C%2Fspan%3E%29+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3E-%26gt%3B%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23c41a16%22%3E%26%2339%3B%24%26%2339%3B%3C%2Fspan%3E%3B%0A%3C%2Fspan%3 +the+.deb+and+.rpm+packages+available+for+each+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FFerretDB%2FFerretDB%2Freleases%22%3Erelease%3C%2Fa%3E.+Follow+the+%3Ca+href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FFerretDB%2FFerretDB%23quickstart%22%3Equick+start+on+Github%3C%2Fa%3E+to+get+started.+Or+just+keep+reading+this+blog+post+-+you+can+try+different+examples+in+a+playground+without+leaving+the+browser.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cp%3EAs+with+MongoDB%2C+you+can+view+the+list+of+databases+in+FerretDB+using+the+%3Ccode%3Eshow+dbs%3C%2Fcode%3E+command.+The+%3Ccode%3Euse%3C%2Fcode%3E+command+allows+you+to+switch+from+one+database+to+another.+If+the+database+does+not+exist%2C+FerretDB+will+create+a+new+one%3A%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cdiv+class%3D%22highlight%22%3E%3Cpre+tabindex%3D%220%22+style%3D%22background-color%3A%23fff%3B-moz-tab-size%3A4%3B-o-tab-size%3A4%3Btab-size%3A4%22%3E%3Ccode+class%3D%22language-js%22+data-lang%3D%22js%22%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Euse%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Eleague%3C%2Fspan%3E%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fcode%3E%3C%2Fpre%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E%3Ccodapi-snippet+sandbox%3D%22ferretdb%22+editor%3D%22basic%22%3E%3C%2Fcodapi-snippet%3E%3Cp%3ESince+there+is+no+existing+database+with+this+name%2C+a+new+database+%28%3Ccode%3Eleague%3C%2Fcode%3E%29+is+created+in+your+FerretDB+storage+backend+%28PostgreSQL+or+SQLite+depending+on+your+configuration%29.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Ch2+id%3D%22create-operation%22%3ECreate+operation%3C%2Fh2%3E%3Cp%3ESimilar+to+MongoDB%2C+FerretDB+provides+the+%3Ccode%3EinsertOne%28%29%3C%2Fcode%3E+and+%3Ccode%3EinsertMany%28%29%3C%2Fcode%3E+methods+for+adding+new+records+to+a+collection.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Ch3+id%3D%22insertone%22%3EinsertOne%28%29%3C%2Fh3%3E%3Cp%3EUsing+the+database+we+created+earlier%2C+let%26%2339%3Bs+insert+a+single+document+record+with+fields+and+values+into+the+collection+by+calling+the+%3Ccode%3EinsertOne%28%29%3C%2Fcode%3E+method.+The+syntax+for+this+operation+is+as+fol +%3Ccode%3Ewindow%3C%2Fcode%3E+clause.+In+these+cases%2C+we+can+inline+the+window+definition%3A%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cdiv+class%3D%22highlight%22%3E%3Cpre+tabindex%3D%220%22+style%3D%22background-color%3A%23fff%3B-moz-tab-size%3A4%3B-o-tab-size%3A4%3Btab-size%3A4%22%3E%3Ccode+class%3D%22language-sql%22+data-lang%3D%22sql%22%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eselect%3C%2Fspan%3E%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E++%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Erank%3C%2Fspan%3E%28%29+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Eover%3C%2Fspan%3E+%28%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E++++%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eorder%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eby%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Esalary%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Edesc%3C%2Fspan%3E%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E++%29+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eas%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23c41a16%22%3E%26%2334%3Brank%26%2334%3B%3C%2Fspan%3E%2C%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E++%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Ename%3C%2Fspan%3E%2C+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Edepartment%3C%2Fspan%3E%2C+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Esalary%3C%2Fspan%3E%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Efrom%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Eemployees%3C%2Fspan%3E%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eorder%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eby%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23c41a16%22%3E%26%2334%3Brank%26%2334%3B%3C%2Fspan%3E%2C+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Eid%3C%2Fspan%3E%3B%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2F Cem%3Ematerialized%3C%2Fem%3E+CTE+%E2%80%94+calculated+the+full+result+of+a+table+expression+and+stored+it+until+the+end+of+the+query.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cp%3EThis+is+usually+a+good+thing%3A+the+engine+calculates+the+result+once%2C+and+then+uses+it+several+times+during+the+main+query.+But+sometimes+materialization+prevented+the+engine+from+optimizing+the+query%3A%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cdiv+class%3D%22highlight%22%3E%3Cpre+tabindex%3D%220%22+style%3D%22background-color%3A%23fff%3B-moz-tab-size%3A4%3B-o-tab-size%3A4%3Btab-size%3A4%22%3E%3Ccode+class%3D%22language-sql%22+data-lang%3D%22sql%22%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Ewith%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Ecte%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eas%3C%2Fspan%3E+%28%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eselect%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3E%2A%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Efrom%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Efoo%3C%2Fspan%3E%29%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eselect%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3E%2A%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Efrom%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Ecte%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Ewhere%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Eid%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3E%3D%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%231c01ce%22%3E500000%3C%2Fspan%3E%3B%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fcode%3E%3C%2Fpre%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E%3Cp%3EThe+query+selects+exactly+one+record+by+ID%2C+but+materialization+creates+a+copy+of+the+%3Cem%3Eentire+table%3C%2Fem%3E+in+memory.+Because+of+this%2C+the+query+is+terribly+slow.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cp%3EPostgreSQL+12%2B+and+other+modern+DBMS+have+become+smarter+and+no+longer+do+so.+Materialization+is+used+when+it+does+more+good+than+harm.+Plus% ploratory+data+analysis+%E2%80%94+you+can+import+everything+first%2C+and+then+use+SQL+to+deal+with+problematic+values.+Any+other+DBMS+will+give+an+error+when+importing+and+force+you+to+crunch+the+data+with+scripts+or+manually.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cp%3EOn+the+other+hand%2C+it+causes+a+constant+flow+of+criticism+against+SQLite%3A+you+can+write+things+into+the+production+database+that+you+will+never+be+able+to+sort+out.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cp%3EAnd+now%2C+in+version+3.37%2C+the+problem+is+solved%21%3C%2Fp%3E%3Ch2+id%3D%22strict-tables%22%3ESTRICT+tables%3C%2Fh2%3E%3Cp%3ENow+the+table+can+be+declared+%26%2334%3Bstrict%26%2334%3B.+Strict+tables+do+not+allow+saving+arbitrary+data%3A%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cdiv+class%3D%22highlight%22%3E%3Cpre+tabindex%3D%220%22+style%3D%22background-color%3A%23fff%3B-moz-tab-size%3A4%3B-o-tab-size%3A4%3Btab-size%3A4%22%3E%3Ccode+class%3D%22language-sql%22+data-lang%3D%22sql%22%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Ecreate%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Etable%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Eemployees%3C%2Fspan%3E+%28%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E++++%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Eid%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Einteger%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Eprimary%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Ekey%3C%2Fspan%3E%2C%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E++++%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Ename%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Etext%3C%2Fspan%3E%2C%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E++++%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Esalary%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Einteger%3C%2Fspan%3E%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E%29+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3ESTRICT%3C%2Fspan%3E%3 %3Cli%3EGet+the+address+from+the+array+cell.%3C%2Fli%3E%3Cli%3EGet+the+value+at+that+address.%3C%2Fli%3E%3C%2Fol%3E%3Cp%3EBut+it%26%2339%3Bs+still+constant+time+O%281%29.%3C%2Fp%3E%3Ch2+id%3D%22list--dynamic-array%22%3EList+%3D+Dynamic+Array%3C%2Fh2%3E%3Cp%3EIf+there+are+empty+spaces+left+in+the+array+underneath+the+list%2C+then+the+%3Ccode%3E.append%28item%29%3C%2Fcode%3E+runs+in+constant+time.+All+it+takes+is+to+write+a+new+value+to+a+free+cell+and+increase+the+element+counter+by+1%3A%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cdiv+class%3D%22highlight%22%3E%3Cpre+tabindex%3D%220%22+style%3D%22background-color%3A%23fff%3B-moz-tab-size%3A4%3B-o-tab-size%3A4%3Btab-size%3A4%22%3E%3Ccode+class%3D%22language-py%22+data-lang%3D%22py%22%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23a90d91%22%3Edef%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Eappend%3C%2Fspan%3E%28%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%235b269a%22%3Eself%3C%2Fspan%3E%2C+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Eitem%3C%2Fspan%3E%29%3A%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E++++%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%235b269a%22%3Eself%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3E.%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Earray%3C%2Fspan%3E%5B%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%235b269a%22%3Eself%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3E.%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Elength%3C%2Fspan%3E%5D+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3E%3D%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Eitem%3C%2Fspan%3E%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22display%3Aflex%22%3E%3Cspan%3E++++%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%235b269a%22%3Eself%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3E.%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3Elength%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%23000%22%3E%2B%3D%3C%2Fspan%3E+%3Cspan+style%3D%22color%3A%231c01ce%22%3E1%3C%2Fspan%3E%0A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fcode%3E%3C%2Fpre%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E%3Cp%3EBut+what+if+t
